FileFormat.FormatDescription: FreeHand, created by Altsys Corporation in 1988 and licensed to Aldus Corporation, is a discontinued vector graphic editor for Windows and Mac. Uses include professional illustration, desktop publishing and web content. FreeHand versions 1 though to 4 were released by Aldus, later versions were developed by Macromedia. In 2005 Adobe Systems acquired Macromedia but FreeHand development has been discontinued.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: MAC File Type Code 'AGD1' followed by 'Aldus FreeHand 4'
